room_title: Escape room "The Art of the Steal" by Escape in 60 in Cleveland
room_description: A laser-based security system lies between your team of thieves and the score of a lifetime. Accept the challenge and you will break into our fully operational bank (and its secure vault) in the dark of night. Using flashlights and only the tools provided, you will attempt to pilfer the largest diamond known to man, along with all the other riches in the vault.
